SummaryEnglish: At the birthday party of an old King closer to the end of his life than the beginning, a mysterious witch interrupts the festivities and kidnaps several children, including the young princess of the Kingdom. Despite his advanced age, his tired bones and his apparent weakness, the King decides to take up arms one last time, to go and rescue the children. This is how he embarks on what will be his very last adventure, accompanied by his old comrades, also crumbling, but more than ever motivated to shine once again.
Aliases: La Derni√®re Aventure du comte Lancedur

1.SummaryEnglish: On the island of Albuera, Lance Dur, former Forgelance hero and master of the city, is about to celebrate his 70th birthday, surrounded by his loved ones and former companions. Unfortunately, Belladonna, his former wife, interrupts the festivities and kidnaps all the children, including Ozie, his granddaughter...

2.SummaryEnglish: Lance Dur, accompanied by his former companions and his son, Agard, has set sail to reach Belladonna's lair. Unfortunately for them, the trip turns out to be more eventful than expected...

3.SummaryEnglish: Lance Dur and his companions have managed to break free from the fishmen's grip, but the storm has caused them to drift on the edge of a mysterious island. Unfortunately for them, other enemies, lurking in the shadows, are waiting for them there...

4.SummaryEnglish: Forty years ago, Cadence, a Xelor and member of Lance Dur's crew, marvels at the fabulous treasure that stands before her. Unfortunately, by seizing a gigantic precious stone, she awakens the armor of Cire Momore, the latter's protector and capable of sucking the souls of those who tread on his territory...

5.SummaryEnglish: Our companions managed to reach the end of the Zaap thanks to Chaille's unerring flair, but had to resolve to say goodbye to him, like Cadence, forty years earlier. As they take the time to honor the memory of their fallen friend, Agard discovers the terrible secret behind the eternal youth of his mother, Belladonna. Unfortunately for them, Cire Momore is always on their tails...

6.SummaryEnglish: In order to protect his people from danger, Hard Lance stands guard at the edge of the flower field, though the terrible demon's armor seems unable to pass through it. As time passes at high speed, the group starts moving again, still followed by Cire Momore. But as the latter gradually gained ground, Biste, vindictive, prepared to confront the latter.

7.SummaryEnglish: At the cost of many sacrifices, Agard and his father have finally managed to reach the castle of Belladona. Will our two heroes succeed in confronting the monsters standing in front of them and free Ozie and the other children, prisoners of the terrible witch?
